name: FY 2022 Operation Allies Welcome Airport Assistance Grant
popular_name: FY 2022 Operation Allies Welcome Airport Assistance Grant
objective: To reimburse airport authorities for services provided and expenses incurred while serving as points of entry in support of Operation Allies Welcome to ensure that Afghan allies were safely welcomed into the United States.
beneficiary_types: Specialized group (e.g. health professionals, students, veterans)

results.description: N/A - this is a one-time reimbursement  to airport authorities for activity that has already occurred providing services while serving as points of entry in support of Operation Allies Welcome, to ensure that Afghan allies were safely welcomed into the United States.  There will be no prospective activities  completed or observed.

authorizations.text: Department of Homeland Security Apporpriations Act, 2022, Department of Homeland Security Apporpriations Act, 2022, Pub. L. No 117-103, Division F, Title I: Departmental Management, Operations Intelligence and Oversight: SEC. 108. (a) Amounts provided in title II of division B of Public Law 117-70 for "Office of the Secretary and Executive Management - Operations and Support" are available for providing reimbursement to airports and airport operators for costs incurred between August 1, 2021, and September 30, 2022, for activities directly and demonstrably related to Operation Allies Welcome.

rules_regulations:
Statutory formula is not applicable to this assistance listing.
Matching requirements are not applicable to this assistance listing.
MOE requirements are not applicable to this assistance listing.
